org.semanticweb.kaon2.api.logic
Interface QueryDefinition

All Superinterfaces:
Axiom
public interface QueryDefinition
extends Axiom

Rerepsents a definition of a query. Such a definition can be stored in an ontology to be used at run-time.

getDistinguishedVariables

Variable[] getDistinguishedVariables()
